text: Luis Ángel González Macchi (born December 13, 1947) is a Paraguayan politician. He was the President of Paraguay from 1999 until 2003. On December 4, 2006, González Macchi was sentenced to eight years in prison for fraud and embezzlement.Former Paraguay president jailed The sentence was appealed. ==References== ==Other websites== * Biography by CIDOB Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:People from Asunción Category:Presidents of Paraguay Category:South American lawyers
title: Luis Ángel González Macchi
